p: Frankincense oleogum resins were purchased from competent trustworthy traders or were obtained from cooperation partners. Samples # 1–8, 12–15, 17–21, and 25–40 were purchased from Georg Huber (Jeomra, Seeheim, Germany). Samples # 22–24 were from Alfred Galke (Alfred Galke GmbH, Bad Grund, Germany). Samples # 9–11 were provided by Luay J. Rashan (Dhofar University, Oman) and sample # 16 was from Stephan Pohl (Staufen, Germany). A sample of B. occulta was provided by Mats Thulin (Evolutionary Biology Centre, Department of Organismal Biology, Uppsala University, Sweden) [ 16]. Voucher specimens of all Boswellia oleogum resins are deposited at the Herbarium of the Botanical Garden of Ulm University, Institute of Systemic Botany and Ecology, Germany (voucher: ULM-24224, see Table S1).
